description:
Maya and ZBrush offer you a powerful altertnative to producing logo and graphic and it not as hard as you think!

In this ZBrush and Maya course I will show you my method for quickly producing fantastic graphics, not only this but because they are 3D you always have the choice to animate them and produce new views with the click of the render button!

What we learn

  • Create great visuals and concepts in minutes
  • Import and export from Maya to ZBrush and back again manually
  • Basic modelling techniques in Maya
  • Basic Sculpting in ZBrush
  • Doc resizing and render out put from ZBrush
  • Quick Compositing in photoshop

What you need

  • A computer that will run Maya and ZBrush
  • Any basic image editing program
  • A willingness to learn

By the end of this course you will have fundamental skills you can easily adapt for a multitude of purposes.
title: Logo and Graphic Design Using Maya and ZBrush for All Levels
